title: Rotis Sans CE
content:
Hello,   
   
Anyone knows where I can purchase the CE (East European) version of Rotis Sans family?   
   
Thanks   
   
Marius
author: Marius Ursache

comments.content: I guess you can get it from Linotype, but I couldn't find anything at their website. Send them an email.

Some time ago I have the Rotis-family in CE, Greek and Cyrillic produced. Even the Italic styles of the SemiSerif (!). I have it offered M\*\*\*type. But these have said NO after long negotiations and many examples. Want to make an in-house development which shall be offered as of 2007-2008. So licenser is Agfa-Monotype. Linotype and FontShop but also have produced CE customizations of the Rotis in the past. Enquire there...

You can buy all Linotype fonts in CE from Dataline company at [http://www.fontexplorer.cz/index.php?s=2&d=24](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106064749/http:/www.fontexplorer.cz/index.php?s=2&d=24).   
Filip Blazek
